1.0.name: wordpress/the-bug-genie-for-wp
1.0.description:
This plugin provides shortcodes that interface with the API of The Bug Genie, a great open-source bug tracking software. Currently, it is possible to link to individual issues, list issues by project and link to a project's bug report form.

These shortcodes are available:

  • [issue project=key issue=nr] -- prints a short link to the specified issue. If you add title=yes the issue title is printed, too.
  • [issues project=key] -- prints a list of all issues of the specified project. See the FAQ for filtering options.
  • [reportbug project=key] -- Prints a link the the specified project's report form. You can provide a custom link text as shortcode content, i.e. [reportbug project=key]My Text[/reportbug].

For a list of known issues see
